title: You don't need to work on hard problems (2020)
dot: digraph{subgraph cluster_College{label="College" node[shape=box]"Internship Recruiting"->"Jane Street Internship"[label="Looking for hard problems"]"Jane Street Internship"->"Back to Campus"[label="Improve integration algorithm"]}subgraph cluster_Campus{label="Campus" node[shape=box]"Back to Campus"->"Declare Math Major"[label="Falling asleep in non - math lectures"]"Declare Math Major"->"Real World 2014"[label="Get assigned adviser"]}subgraph cluster_RealWorld2014{label="Real World 2014" node[shape=box]"Real World 2014"->"Real World 2015"[label="Bored of college, work for startup"]}subgraph cluster_RealWorld2015{label="Real World 2015" node[shape=box]"Real World 2015"->"Real World 2016"[label="Switch from earning to give to Wave"]}subgraph cluster_RealWorld2016{label="Real World 2016" node[shape=box]"Real World 2016"->"Conclusion"[label="Handle accounting problems at Wave"]}subgraph cluster_Conclusion{label="Conclusion" node[shape=box]"Conclusion"->"Don't look for hard problems"[label="Hard problems not always best"]}"School (Closed - world)"->"Real World (Open - world)"[label="Differences"]"Real World (Open - world)"->"Misguided Focus on Hard Problems"[label="Elite school graduates"]"Misguided Focus on Hard Problems"->"Better Approaches"[label="Realize importance of other factors"]"Better Approaches"->"Don't look for hard problems"[label="Shift focus to important problems"]}
